properties.Name: RefiningProductPriceList
properties.Description: The Price List for a Product as defined for a Country for a specific period.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: PriceListTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Price List Type.

Columns.Name: CountryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Country.

Columns.Name: UnitOfMeasureId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Unit Of Measure.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the Product Price List is defined.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the Product Price List is defined.

Columns.Name: RefineryPriceAmount
Columns.Description:
The Standard, or default, price charged by retailers to the public for the Product.

The price of a Product published in a catalog, advertisement or printed list from which discounts, if any, may be subtracted. 

This is the price that normally appears in catalogs, on purchase orders and invoices.

Columns.Name: RefineryCostAmount
Columns.Description: The refinery cost amount for the associated product/units.

Columns.Name: RefineryMarginAmount
Columns.Description: refinery margin = refined product price - (crude price + cost)

Columns.Name: RefineryProductPriceNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the refinery product price.

Properties.Description: The Price List for a Product as defined for a Country for a specific period.
